Original.Title: Original Version
Original.Description: This is a default placeholder for origional versions of texts and resources

VUL.Title: Vulgata
VUL.Description: The Latin Vulgate is an early 5th century version of the Bible in Latin.

NVUL.Title: Nova Vulgata
NVUL.Description: First published in 1979, with a second edition in 1986.
NVUL.License: © 1986 Libreria Editrice Vaticana, Città del Vaticano

LH.Title: Thesaurus Liturgiae Horarum Monasticae
LH.Description: Liturgia Horarum from Libreria Editrice Vaticana.
LH.License: © 2000 Libreria Editrice Vaticana, Città del Vaticano
LH.Permission: Published, in part, to support the creation of vernacular texts to use in the life of the church. This is the reason this is included.

OEB.Title: Open English Bible
OEB.Description: Committed to creating a completely free modern English translation of the Bible

AELF.Title: Association Épiscopale Liturgique Francophones
AELF.Description: Association Épiscopale Liturgique pour les pays Francophones.

BMU-FR.Title: Bréviaire Monastique Urbain Français
BMU-FR.Description: La traduction française du psautier utilisée par Urban Monasticism.

TMU-FR.Title: Traduction Monastique Urbain Français
TMU-FR.Description: La traduction française utilisée par Urban Monasticism.

UMB-EN.Title: Urban Monastic Breviary
UMB-EN.Description: The english translation of the Psalter used by Urban Monasticism

UMT-EN.Title: Urban Monastic Translation
UMT-EN.Description: The english translation used by Urban Monasticism

SBLGNT.Title: Society of Biblical Literature Greek New Testament
SBLGNT.Description: This is a greek new testament which is made available to us to use by the Society of Biblical Literature.
SBLGNT.License: © 2010 by the [Society of Biblical Literature](http://sbl-site.org/) and [Logos Bible Software](http://www.logos.com/).

CODEX-SINAITICUS.Title: Codex Sinaiticus (Septuigent and New Testament)
CODEX-SINAITICUS.Description: A transcribed copy of the the Coex Sinaiticus which is one of the oldest and most intact versions of the greek bible.
CODEX-SINAITICUS.License: Codex Sinaiticus by [The Codex Sinaiticus Project](http://www.codexsinaiticus.org/) is licensed under a [Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/).
CODEX-SINAITICUS.Notes: The current texts were imported version 1.04 (25.3.2014) in March 2021.

WLC.Title: Westminster Leningrad Codex
WLC.Description: A digitized version of the Leningrad Codex (1008 CE).
WLC.License: All biblical Hebrew text, in any format, may be viewed or copied without restriction. [Citation of this site as the source](https://tanach.us/) of the text is appreciated. Please include the version number, 26.2, as a reference.
WLC.Notes: The current texts were imported version 26.2 (18 Dec 2020) in March 2021.
